channel.title: Skylee Nelson's GitHub Site
channel.description: Recent content on Skylee Nelson's GitHub Site

item.title: '96 Bulls vs '16 Warriors: Who is the best basketball team?
item.description: The 1995-96 Chicago Bulls and 2015-16 Golden State Warriors are considered to be two of the greatest team’s in NBA history. Both teams had record breaking seasons as well as NBA All-Star players Michael Jordan, Scottie Pippen, Stephen Curry, Draymond Green, and Klay Thompson. The Bulls had won their third straight NBA championships. The Warriors, however, began their season 20-0 but later fell short in the championship game against the Cleveland Cavaliers.

item.title: Which Plumlee brother is the best?
item.description: Miles, Mason, and Marshall Plumlee were all top-ranked basketball recruits heading into college at Duke University. The brother’s spent four years on the Blue Devils roster, and in that time each have contributed to winning a national championship. The brothers’ success at Duke ultimately led each of them to reach the highest level of basketball playing in the NBA. The Plumlee trio was an unforgettable time for Blue Devils basketball.

item.title: About Skylee Nelson
item.description: My Name is Skylee Nelson. I am currently a student attending the University of Nebraska-Lincoln double majoring in sports media and communication as well as broadcasting. Native of Grand Island.
